price: 102. Soki tozuaka nzela ya bozongi (ata na mokili), tolingaki kozala okati ya bandimi. (baye bazali kosala bolamu.)
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
